user_account_identity_documents_intro: Your account has been created. To place an order on our website, you will need to check that the order is being processed in accordance with Indian law.
user_account_identity_documents_intro_ot: If you are an Individual, you only need to submit the required proof of identity and address. In this case, a sworn statement and proof of VAT arenâ€™t required.
user_account_identity_documents_selectio: Format: jpg, jpeg, pdf, png. The file size limit for each document is 10 MB.
The {{values}} format of the downloaded document(s) is not supported. Please respect the format requirements: jpg, jpeg, pdf, and png.
user_account_identity_documents_submit_s: Thank you, we have received your documents!
They will be submitted to our teams for validation. You will be notified of their validation by email, or you will be contacted if we need further information.
user_account_identity_documents_submit_e: Your documents were not sent correctly. Please re-upload your documents.
user_account_identity_documents_legal_in: OVH S.A.S is responsible for processing your personal data. The data collected through this form is processed in order to comply with the Cybersecurity Guidelines of 28.04.2022, published by CERT-In pursuant to the provisions of subsection (6) of section 70B of the Information Technology (IT) Act, 2000.
To find out more about how your data is processed, along with your rights, please refer to our Policy on the Use of Personal Data.
The documents will be retained for 5 years after the end of the contract.
user_account_identity_documents_verifica: Your documents are currently being processed by our team.
Your request has been processed but we require additional documents. Please consult your support ticket.
